text: Agek Jisas pen agak, Pen yɨp kod mɨdeban ak nad ke mel, God nokom adek alaŋ mɨdeb ak agek kod mɨdeban agak. Anɨb ak tap tɨmel yɨp geban ak, nak mɨŋel sɨkol olap dɨnɨgaban agak. Bɨ pen yɨp dad apɨl nep ñɨl, yɨp gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup ak, mɨŋel awl yɨbɨl ak dɨnɨgab agak.19.11 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, gos kɨli anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Jisas ne agak, Bɨ pen yɨp dad apɨl nep ñɨl, yɨp gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup ak agak ak, Jisas ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak Kayapas nop gos nɨŋɨd anɨb agak. Jon 11.49-50 ayɨp Mak 14.60-64 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
